bug.cf_release_notes:
[from https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Documentation_Development_Haskell_Beat]
The GHC Haskell compiler has been updated from version 7.8.4 to 7.10.3 in Fedora 25. Haskell packages in Fedora have been rebuilt with the new compiler, and many packages updated. Users will need to update and rebuild their own Haskell projects.
The latest stable version of GHC provides many improvements and enhancements. For details, refer to the upstream release notes:
https://downloads.haskell.org/~ghc/latest/docs/html/users_guide/release-7-10-1.html https://downloads.haskell.org/~ghc/latest/docs/html/users_guide/release-7-10-2.html https://downloads.haskell.org/~ghc/latest/docs/html/users_guide/release-7-10-3.html

long_desc.thetext:
This is a tracking bug for Change: GHC 7.10 For more details, see: https://fedoraproject.org//wiki/Changes/GHC_7.10
Update Fedora's version of the GHC Haskell compiler to version 7.10.

On 2016-Feb-23, we have reached Fedora 24 Change Checkpoint: Completion deadline (testable).
At this point, all accepted changes should be substantially complete, and testable. Additionally, if a change is to be enabled by default, it must be so enabled at Change Completion deadline.
Change tracking bug should be set to the MODIFIED state to indicate it achieved completeness.
Incomplete and non testable Changes will be reported to FESCo on 2016-Feb-26 meeting. Contingency plan for System Wide Changes, if planned for Alpha (or in case of serious doubts regarding Change completion), will be activated.

No progress mostly due to lack of package review manpower and time. :(
We're postponing ghc-7.10 until F25.

(For those keen to use ghc-7.10.3 on Fedora you can use my Copr https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/petersen/ghc-7.10.3/ and may also find https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/petersen/stack/ useful.)
This work is largely done and testable now in Fedora Rawhide.
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 25 development cycle. Changing version to '25'.

On 2016-Sep-27 we reached the "Change Checkpoint: 100% Code Complete Deadline" milestone for Fedora 25 release. At this point all the Changes not at least in "ON_QA" state should be brought to FESCo for review. Please update the state of this bug to "ON_QA" if it is already 100% completed. Please let me know in case you have any trouble with the implementation and the Change needs any help or review.
Thanks, Jan
This is basically finished - i working on cleaning up the last remaining dependency breakage asap.
